itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Peter Boghossian, the author of “How to Have Impossible Conversations”,  to discuss how wokeism has ruined the American university system, how it is permeating and destroying other American institutions, and what you can do to combat it.
